attributes.action: buy back Giro Bank from Alliance & Leicester.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banks are probably about to introduce service charges to customers holding accounts with them. The undersigned petitioners are requesting that either Giro Bank is bought back by the state or a new state bank is opened to provide free banking services for those customers who remain in credit and only levy fair and reasonable charges for overdrafts etc. Banks are currently making obscene profits for their board members at the expense of the British Public.
